name: Link Click Secret Santa Otome
description:
[CURRENTLY IN PRE-ALPHA STAGE]

Welcome to Link Click Secret Santa Otome, inspired by the donghua/show, Link Click! You play as a old college friend of Cheng Xiaoshi's, Lu Guang's and Qiao Ling's; meeting the trio to spend Christmas and exchange gifts!

Along with gifts, will there also be the exchange of heartfelt moments and confessions?

CURRENTLY HAS:

  • 1 routes and 2 endings

This game was made for Jamie from the Link Click discord server!

NOTES:

  • Out of the 3 planned routes, only the Cheng Xiaoshi route is complete. The Lu Guang and Qiao Ling routes will be implemented in future updates.
  • This game is in the pre-alpha stage, therefore it is far from complete. All dialogues, events and plot points are subject to change.

Thank you, and hope you enjoy!
